content: I like the games. Alot of the games are the same but in different format. I wanted a word search game without the ads. At $3 this game works. You can also see other peoples scores on the games. Has a ballon popping game, crossword, math, word spelling games, christmas-halloween & thanksgiving game. Alot of variety gor your money. Phone hasnt slowed down and no pop up commercials while playing. Over all I recommend it.

content: Great way to exercise your brain while having fun. Tons of games, there's something for everyone. I spend way too much time on it and I haven't played all of them yet. There's so many games. It's a bit addictive, I keep playing to beat my previous score. Easy to see and read.

content: Challenging enough. Playing under üá¨üáß as don't see USA flag for English. Not an issue so far

content: Good range of games, but unfortunately like most word games, it only has a US English dictionary and not British. So it has US spellings in it like "nite" and "thru". Even though the language selection icon is a UK Union Flag! US and UK spellings are very different.
replyContent: Hi Neill. Thank you for info! You are right about those words, 'through' and 'night' are the only acceptable ways to spell those words in a formal situation. But in informal situations (especially when texting or messaging), the forms thru and nite are becoming increasingly popular. (We are limited here by 350 characters, so please send us email)

content: Though there are some games that you can do in casual mode, there aren't enough of them. Too many timed games makes it extremely frustrating for those who like to take their time. Many game theme repeats.
replyContent: Hi Dawn! Most of our games contain a RELAX mode (untimed). To activate the relax mode please tap on a CLOCK ICON in the top right corner of the HOW TO PLAY SCREEN! Please always feel free to communicate with us directly via our email. You can for example let us know in what games you are missing a relax mode and we can add it :) Have fun!

content: Since when has this game become a Harman by Samsung game? Has it always been?
replyContent: Hi there. Yes, a year ago Adobe terminated their development on AIR (software that our game is built in) and Harman took it over from them. They take care of AIR and its future now. We must use Harman otherwise we can not release any new updates of our app due to new google play policies. Harman is only SW (like UNITY) that our game is built in.

content: I love the number of games that come with this app! I use this app daily. The only thing I would like added is for it to save current games when you exit so you don't have to start a new one when you open them back up. I run into this a lot with the unlimited game at appts. I exit to see a Dr then have to start over when I reopen it.
replyContent: Hi Taryn! Thank you so much for your support and review, we are glad you like our Word Games app!:) About SAVING: 1) Some games have direct option to save the game (Wordies, Word Connect,..). 2) Some games are saved after each level. 3) Some games don't have it to prevent cheating. 4) If you just close the app (don't quit) you can continue playing.

Having said that we will put it on a list of things that we will try to improve in next updates. Edit: a new update is LIVE with improved letters distribution :)

content: What annoyed me was your reply to my generous rating after a few hours of use. I am going to delete until my rating is justified over sufficient period of use. After a 30yr career in marketing, if a client volunteered a 5* rating, I would be inclined to leave well enough alone. I met with private clients in person every 4-6 weeks & public sector, quarterly. If excellent customer/client satisfaction is consistently achieved, advertising budgets are easily reduced. My happy clients sold FOR US.
replyContent: Edit: Hi EILEENMARI, thank you so so much for your opinion, this kind of feedback is the most valuable for us! We are just a small indie studio that is always listening to comments and feedback from players of our games, we are still learning some things and always trying to improve them. Thank you. (Michal)

content: I rarely give 5 stars so I am happy to pay a reasonable price and give the highest rating to this game. Best feature is NO ads. Love the variety of word play. I really appreciate the offline mode for the times I have to disconnect. Please don't break the game with too many updates. Most of my DATA is consumed by ads and frequent updates.
replyContent: Hi Chesh, thanks so so much for your feedback and rating! There is nothing better than reading that players enjoy our Word Games app! Have fun and thank you again!
